$11, Amazon.com Photo: Lucas Film Image 21 of 21 Darth Vader showerhead and other products only 'Star Wars' geeks would want 1  /  21 Back to Gallery With the Force Awakens arriving in movie theaters in December, a flurry of new Star Wars -themed products are promising to transport you to a galaxy far, far away.
The latest ones to hit store shelves this week are a pair of showerheads that allow you to bring the force in the bathroom and bathe in your geekiness.  
Two models by Oxygenics are sold at Bed Bath & Beyond: a Darth Vader   Handheld Showerhead  handheld with three spray settings for washing away those Rebel germs, and an R2-D2   3-Spray Showerhead shaped like the adorable droid. 
Yes, these inspired bathroom gadgets are something only the biggest  Star Wars  nerds would ever want and so are the other products included in the gallery above.
